title: SET_CHECKPOINT_CYLINDER_HEIGHT
content:
0x2707AAE9D9297D890xFF0F9B22// SetCheckpointCylinderHeight
void SET_CHECKPOINT_CYLINDER_HEIGHT(int checkpoint, float nearHeight, float farHeight, float radius);Sets the cylinder height of the checkpoint.  
Parameters:  
* nearHeight - The height of the checkpoint when inside of the radius.  
* farHeight - The height of the checkpoint when outside of the radius.  
* radius - The radius of the checkpoint.
codeBlocks:
// SetCheckpointCylinderHeight
void SET_CHECKPOINT_CYLINDER_HEIGHT(int checkpoint, float nearHeight, float farHeight, float radius);

Sets the cylinder height of the checkpoint.  
Parameters:  
* nearHeight - The height of the checkpoint when inside of the radius.  
* farHeight - The height of the checkpoint when outside of the radius.  
* radius - The radius of the checkpoint.
